goal.en: General chemistry is a two-semester course that introduces organic, inorganic, physical, and analytical chemistry at an introductory level. The objective is to ensure that students acquire the foundational knowledge and be able to apply these chemical principles in advanced courses as well as undergraduate/graduate research projects.
goal.ch: 普通化學是為期兩個學期的課程，介紹有機、無機、物理和分析化學的入門知識。其目標為使學生擁有基礎的化學概念，以銜接更進階的課程及應用於大學或研究所的專題計畫。

content.en:
The content includes 11 chapters:
Ch 6. Chemical Equilibrium
Ch 7. Acids and Bases
Ch 8. Applications of Aqueous Equilibria
Ch 9. Energy, Enthalpy and Thermochemistry
Ch 10. Spontaneity, Entropy and Free Energy
Ch 15. Chemical Kinetics
Ch 16. Liquids and Solids
Ch 17. Properties of Solution
Ch 18. The Representative Elements
Ch 19. Transition Elements and Coordination Chemistry
Ch 21. Organic and Biochemical Molecules
content.ch:
授課 11 章
第6章 化學平衡
第7章 酸和鹼
第8章 水溶液平衡的應用
第9章 能量、焓和熱化學
第10章 自發性、熵和自由能
第15章 化學動力學
第16章 液體和固體
第17章 溶液的性質
第18章 代表性元素
第19章 過渡元素和配位化學
第21章 有機和生化分子

textbook.en: “Steven S. Zumdahl and Donald J. DeCoste, ““Chemical Principles““, 8th Ed.“
textbook.ch: “Steven S. Zumdahl and Donald J. DeCoste, ““Chemical Principles““, 8th Ed.“

grading.ch: 課堂小考: 40％, 期中及期末考試: 60％

office_hr.ch: 星期一下午三點至五點

en.competency: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

ch.competency: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力

en: Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:First Year only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Non-First Year only.

系所:限雙主修-化學學系。
系所:限化學學系。年級:限非一年級。
